snippet.title: Blast Brigade — Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Blast Brigade is a colorful 2D action-adventure that combines intense platformer gameplay with metroidvania exploration. Assemble a team of superspies and shoot your way through a tainted paradise island to take down the evil genius Dr. Cread and his army of monsters. 

Coming to Steam Early Access later this year.

Wishlist us on Steam: https://t.ly/NHgD 
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/blastbrigade
Hang out in Discord: https://discord.gg/DYEHmA2NZE
Discuss on Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/Blast_Brigade
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/blastbrigade/
Keep an eye on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/blastbrigade/
Check us out on TikTok:  https://www.tiktok.com/@blastbrigade/
